Address.label: Address
Address.value: 5260 CALIFORNIA AVENUE, IRVINE, California, 92617, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Skyworks Solutions produces semiconductors for wireless handsets and other devices that are used to enable wireless connectivity. Its main products include power amplifiers, filters, switches, and integrated front-end modules that support wireless transmissions. Skyworks' customers are mostly large smartphone manufacturers, but the firm also has a growing presence in nonhandset applications such as wireless routers, medical devices, and automobiles.
